parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 1.34

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Ropes and Sling Loading

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Returns [[true]] if Sling Load Assistant is open.

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> [[slingLoadAssistantShown]]

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Boolean]] - [[true]] if sling load assistant is shown, [[false]] otherwise

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[waitUntil]] { [[slingLoadAssistantShown]] };
[[hint]] "You lack rudimentary motor skills and basic eye-hand coordination."; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>scold user for unethical practices</value></part></template>
</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ropes]], [[canSlingLoad]], [[enableRopeAttach]], [[getSlingLoad]], [[ropeAttachedObjects]], [[ropeAttachTo]], [[ropeDestroy]], [[ropeLength]], [[ropeUnwound]], [[ropeAttachedTo]], [[ropeCreate]], [[ropeDetach]], [[ropeAttachEnabled]], [[ropeCut]], [[ropeEndPosition]], [[ropeUnwind]]
</value></part></template></root>
